OPEN_VIDEO_TITLE: Choose a Video/Audio file to open...
OPEN_LOG_FILE: Choose a Log file to open...
REBOOT_CONFIRM_DETAIL: Do you want to reboot now?
SNIPPET_GUIDE_T: $t will replaced current text you have already input.
SNIPPET_GUIDE_C: The caret will move to the $c location.
AUTOSAVE_AFTER: min.(You can enable it from [File] menu.
AUTO_LOCKON_TYPE: Start input memo field from empty.
AUTO_LOCKON_ADDMEMO: Just before adding memo to the list.
SKIPTIME_GUIDE: You can select base jump time from [Playback] menu of bottom menu of [◀◀][▶▶] buttons.
